code: var TPS=0.05;var TVQ_2013_PLUS=0.09975;var TVQ_2012=0.095;var TVQ_2011=0.085;function calculTPS(montantSansTaxe){return montantSansTaxe*TPS;}function calculTVQ(annee,montantSansTaxe){if(annee>="2013"){return montantSansTaxe*TVQ_2013_PLUS;}else if(annee==="2012"){return montantSansTaxe*TVQ_2012;}else{return montantSansTaxe*TVQ_2011;}}export{calculTPS,calculTVQ};
